translation.description: Are you curious about how popular your name or surname is in Malaysia? Or perhaps you're a parent-to-be searching for a unique name for your child? Our name popularity dashboard lets you explore the popularity of any Malaysian name or surname with just a few clicks. Using Malaysia's gold-standard IC database, you can discover how many Malaysians share your name and gain fascinating insights into the country's diverse culture. Check it out now and satisfy your curiosity!
translation.privacy_prompt: To preserve privacy, timeseries data for this name is not displayed.
translation.bar_title_first_one: There is {{count, number}} living Malaysian with the first name
translation.bar_title_first_other: There are {{count, number}} living Malaysians with the first name
translation.bar_title_last_one: There is {{count, number}} living Malaysian with the surname
translation.bar_title_last_other: There are {{count, number}} living Malaysians with the surname
translation.bar_description: Here's how many newborns were named {{ name }} over the years:
translation.validation_text: Time series data for this name is not made available, because there are too few Malaysians with the {{ type }} name: {{ name }}. Try again!
translation.search_prompt: Start search for name to see your name popularity!
translation.search_details: The data behind this dashboard does not contain any full names. You can only search for your first name (e.g. Anwar, Azizah) or your surname (e.g. Loke, Veerapan).
translation.search_disclaimer: We do not store your input - only you can see your search.
translation.section3_title: Compare your name against your friends and family!
translation.compare_radio: Compare up to 10 names (separate by comma)
translation.compare_validation: Please enter more than one name
translation.compare_prompt: Start entering names to compare popularity!
